__e: I tried making conversation with him, but he was distracted by a younger woman.
It's the oldest tool of power. If you're distracted by fear of those around you it keeps you from seeing the actions of those above.
I needed somebody to look at me instead of being fucking distracted by something more important.
Well, I just about laid an egg, but he was distracted then by your, uh, silly rubber there.
I know, but what I'm saying is we missed an opportunity when he was distracted by May coming towards--
And something about her having a pretty face and he was distracted by that.
Excuse me for being a little light-headed, no thanks to you.
Maybe you got distracted and think we made it.. ..but I'm sure we didn't.
I admit that my focus has been a little split recently, and maybe I haven't been doing the best job of my life.
